import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceModuleService } from 'src/app/services/service-module.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-module', templateUrl: './module.component.html', styleUrls: ['./module.component.css'] }) export class ModuleComponent { constructor(private serviceModule: ServiceModuleService){} module = { nameModule: '', credit: '' }; addModule() : void { this.serviceModule.createModule(this.module).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Added successfully', response); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } deleteModule(moduleId: number): void { this.serviceModule.deleteModule(moduleId).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Deleted successfully', response); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } updateModule(moduleId: number, newData: any): void { this.serviceModule.updateModule(moduleId, newData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Updated successfully', response); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } getAllModules(): void { this.serviceModule.getModules().subscribe(modules => { console.log('List of Modules:', modules); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } getModuleById(moduleId: number): void { this.serviceModule.getModuleById(moduleId).subscribe(module => { console.log('Module Details:', module); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } }
